Fat Man Challenges

We have quaterly and annual challenges. The big one for the year is the 1000km 2017 challenge. We also have the Angkor Wat Half Marathon coming up and RED - Run Every Day December!

Already Knocked Off

Run Every Day December

Gotta run 20mins or 3km every single day of December. No expecptions made... even on Xmas Day!

Fastest Fatman, Least Fastest Fatman, Silly Cock

Shah Alam 10km Run

Challenging 10km run in the middle of the night... not sure why... maybe to avoid the heat but that ain't never going to be the case + Fat Men love a good sweat up

Fastest Fatman, Least Fastest Fatman, Silly Cock

Highlander Trail Run

Brutal trail run with something like 500meters in vertical climb. Epic race from Man of Steele winning it outright and then having shots with the local Mayor

Fastest Fatman, Least Fastest Fatman, Silly Cock
